text.text_translated: Our results show that Girox Foods should change its management style. It should focus more on its people. The company should allow employees to choose their work hours. It should also let them work from places they choose. Managers need to give staff interesting tasks. They should also give positive comments to show they value the work people do. Finally, spending more money on job training is important. This helps create a good work environment. For example, training in how to communicate with people from different cultures is useful. This will help employees do their best work.
